author: Reuters Editorial
title: Anhui Anke Biotechnology Group says dividend payment date on May 4
text:
April 26 (Reuters) - Anhui Anke Biotechnology Group Co Ltd
* Says it will pay a cash dividend of 1.5 yuan (before tax) per 10 shares and use additional paid-in capital to distribute 4 new shares for every 10 shares for 2017, to shareholders of record on May 3
* Says the companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on May 4 and the dividend will be paid on May 4
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/n3kmwC
 (Beijing Headline News)
